description: This file defines a global exception handler class for a Spring Boot application. It intercepts specified exceptions and returns structured API error responses, including resource not found, validation errors, and generic exceptions.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller advice that handles exceptions globally across controllers and returns standardized error responses.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles ResourceNotFoundException and returns a 404 NOT FOUND response with error details.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors (MethodArgumentNotValidException) and returns a 400 BAD REQUEST with error details.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR with error details and debug info.

methods.name: baseBody
methods.description: Constructs a standardized response body with timestamp, status, error, and message.
